text: Kevin Kugler is a former co-host of Unsportsmanlike Conduct. He calls college football, basketball, and baseball for Westwood One/Dial Global. Kugler was added to the NFL booth and was the voice of the Nebraska Cornhuskers football and men's basketball. Kugler also calls college football and basketball games for the Big Ten Network as well as Jacksonville Jaguars preseason games replacing Paul Burmeister. title: Kevin Kugler
